FCDLayer Class Reference

Public Attributes

fm::string name

StringList objects
 The list of COLLADA entity ids which are contained by this layer.

Detailed Description

A layer declaration.

Contains a name for the layer and the ids of all the entities within the layer.

Member Data Documentation

The layer name.

There is no guarantee of uniqueness.
